tool.name: Dataset Merger
tool.description: Read multiple text files and merge into a single output file for further processing

param.name: delimiter
param.label: Apply file delimiter to separate documents
param.help: The delimiter is used to separate input files.

tool.help:
**What it does**
DatasetReader takes multiple .txt files as inputs and merges them into a single output for further processing.
This tool is useful when one wants to 1. use multiple files as a single dataset, and perform calculations such as C-value. 2. have multiple files as inputs but only one output.
-----
**Example 1**
**WARNING:** This tool will only work on properly formatted .txt datasets, it does not change the contexts of the text files.
